DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis To Last Clinical Assessment Time in Months Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Duration of the length of time from surgical diagnosis to the date of last clinical assessment, expressed as a number of months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis To Last Clinical Assessment Time in Months
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Number of calendar months from the time of surgical diagnosis to the date of last clinical assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis Last Clinical Assessment Time
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Surgical; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: Surgical; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration of an event expressed in number of months.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a concept of quantity derived from zero and units.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of months to Last Clinical Assessment

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University adoption of C3D.
